attributes.action: link MPs pay and conditions to that of the Public Sector
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All MPs pay and conditions should be linked to that of the Public Sector.

This should include a pay rise linked to that of the LOWEST pay offer within the Public Sector.  Links towards holidays and expenses should also be introduced.

Furthermore MPs should not be allowed to vote for the pay rise.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
